experience.title: Governor
experience.description: • Spearheaded the organization of the U-21 National Chess League (NCL), an online chess tournament which hosted 700+ participants• Designed and implemented the club's annual budget of INR 1 Lakh, for the purchase of various chess equipment, training software, and premium accounts, and conduction of tournaments like Freshers' Tournament, Chess 960, Open IIT and Inter-Departmental Tournaments• Collaborated with other member IITs and organized the Quarantine Chess Tour - 5 (online blitz tournament for IITs, NITs, BITS, and VITs)• Mentored a team of 30+ students for year-round tournaments and club activities including weekly training and practice sessions.
